title: BarmyBasket
author: BarmyBasket
created_time: December 12, 2022, 08:47:42 AMLast edit: December 12, 2022, 09:21:15 AM by BarmyBasket
content: I need the help of this community against this scam by @Chipsgg.For those who are considering playing at this casino, they should read this experience carefully.I signed up for Chips.gg 5 days ago and I deposited $2500.I took some types of bet were World cup football,Nba and Evoulation casino games and I did 15.500 dollars and could not withdraw my money last 2 days.Meanwhile, I uploaded 3 level KYC documents in my account and it was approved On 9.12.2022, A person named Anderson from live support said thatI was abusing Rollbit, which is the same infrastructure but another site, and said that they would delete all my wins from his account and close my membership.I can play games and deposit and withdraw money in my account at Rollbit. There is no abuse.Even continues in our Affiliate partnership with Rollbit.I learned that there are many people in Chips.gg who are experiencing the same situation, I hope you guys careTypes of bets I play: https://i.hizliresim.com/ndi29cc.pngExcuses : https://i.hizliresim.com/rc9dosr.pngEvo : https://i.hizliresim.com/incrclj.pngChips Co Founder : https://twitter.com/The_Magalon  @The_MagalonQuoteThe player was flagged immediately by our sportsbook providers' risk management system for placing value bets on player props.@chipsgg my bets: https://i.hizliresim.com/88773pp.pngI present to you again the proof that I bought the NBA bets from @chipsgg from another casino and that there are similar scales. (holiganbet.com)https://i.hizliresim.com/7lkomif.pngTrey Murph 2.5 3point over 1.79   ///// Chipsgg odds >> Trey Murph 2.5 3point fieled over 1.85Paolo Banchero 19.5 point over 1.76 //// Chipsgg odds >> Paolo Banchero 20.5 point over 1.81Shai Gilgeous Alexander 29.5 point under 1.84  ///// Chipsgg odds >> Shai Gilgeous Alexander 29.5 Under 2.00WC player bet tempobet.comhttps://i.hizliresim.com/tj54q5s.pngMorocco-Spain133 passes over Aymeric Laporte 1.88  /// Chipsgg oddds>> Laporte 136 passes 1.88Portugal-SwitzerlandAkanji 58.5 passes over 1.88  //////////// Chipsgg odds >> Akanji 59passes 1.88Stakebet WC playerbet : https://i.hizliresim.com/bp3owaf.pngAymeric Laporte 133.5 passes 1.89 //// Chipsgg oddds>> Laporte 136 passes 1.88Akanji 59 passes 1.92  /// Chipsgg odds >> Akanji 59passes 1.88Comparison of the same bets at Chipsgg and other casinos.They are not paying my $13,000 earnings in  because of the bets I placed on the world's 2 biggest sports competitions. I have presented you with proof that the bets I have taken are not value. It is available in bets that I have played and lost from Chipsgg. I didn't play with 100% winrate. 70-80% of my earnings are from BJ Evolution games. I need help from this community. Thanks in advance everyone.

comments.author: BarmyBasket
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on December 12, 2022, 10:14:01 AMYou should lock the older scam accusation thread if you want to have this new thread active. You are already spamming the forum for having 2 active thread with same purpose. Creating new thread will just create more opportunities for user to spam your thread with same opinion comment. The power of the community is very limited and you should convince chips.gg for your case and not us if you want to receive your money.The only thing we can do is to create a flag against the casino and put a negative trust on it. But it will need a very solid evidence like that since they are accusing you for violation of there ToS. We should wait for there response and be patient. Ignoring your concern for a period of time will only mean a red flag. They banned me from live support, they don't respond to my e-mails. This is the only place I can contact @ChipsGg.I was only able to contact them here 2 times and it was thanks to this community. Although none of their answers make sense, at least I'm in touch.My aim is not to spam, it is for this community to see the truth and be on the side of the right.In this case exactlyQuoteAlso impressive job at responding to almost everything but the parts they know are indefensible
